# currentItem

**Instance Property**

The current item.

## Declaration

```swift
@MainActor var currentItem: WKBackForwardListItem? { get }
```

## Getting the Most Recent Items

- **backItem**: The item immediately preceding the current item, if any.
- **forwardItem**: The item immediately following the current item, if any.

items.description: The item immediately preceding the current item, if any.
items.name: backItem

items.description: The item immediately following the current item, if any.
